title: Budget 2022 goes tech-tonic! FM puts focus on e-passport, 5G, gaming, AVGC, EV battery swapping & more - Economic Times
content: Budget 2022 goes tech-tonic! FM puts focus on e-passport, 5G, gaming, AVGC, EV battery swapping & more  Economic Times
description: The FM said that Budget 2022 is a blueprint of economy over 'Amrit Kal' of next 25 yrs.
